items.name: Footify.hu
items.desc: A comprehensive football platform delivering real-time match data, fixtures, and statistics with a focus on user experience and performance. Built to handle thousands of concurrent users during peak match times.
items.caseStudy: Footify.hu represents the intersection of sports passion and technical excellence. Faced with the challenge of creating a platform that could deliver real-time football data to enthusiastic fans, I architected a solution that prioritizes both performance and user experience. The platform handles live match updates, comprehensive statistics, and responsive design across all devices, serving over 2,000 monthly active users with 99.8% uptime.
features: Real-time match data with WebSocket integration
Progressive Web App (PWA) with offline capabilities
Advanced responsive design with mobile-first approach
Optimized performance with lazy loading and code splitting
challenges: Managing real-time data updates without performance degradation
Creating pixel-perfect responsive layouts for diverse screen sizes
Optimizing bundle size while adding rich functionality
Ensuring accessibility compliance across all features
items.solution: Implemented a robust architecture using React 18 with concurrent features, Vite for lightning-fast development and builds, and a sophisticated state management system. Real-time updates are handled through optimized WebSocket connections with smart batching to prevent UI thrashing. The responsive design leverages CSS Grid and Flexbox with Tailwind's utility classes, ensuring consistent experiences across devices.
technicalHighlights: Custom React hooks for data fetching and caching
Optimized re-renders using React.memo and useMemo
Service Worker implementation for offline functionality
TypeScript integration for type safety and developer experience

items.name: Portfolio Website
items.desc: A sophisticated personal portfolio showcasing advanced React techniques, GSAP animations, and Three.js integration. Built with performance and accessibility as core principles.
items.caseStudy: This portfolio serves as both a showcase of my capabilities and a testbed for cutting-edge web technologies. The challenge was to create a visually stunning experience that demonstrates technical proficiency while maintaining excellent performance metrics and accessibility standards. Every animation, interaction, and design decision reflects my commitment to quality and attention to detail.
features: Sophisticated contact form with multi-step wizard
Responsive design from mobile to 4K displays
challenges: Balancing visual richness with performance requirements
Creating smooth animations that work across devices
Implementing complex 3D scenes without impacting load times
Building a bilingual experience with proper SEO
Ensuring accessibility while maintaining visual appeal
items.solution: Developed a modular architecture with lazy-loaded components, implemented GSAP with ScrollTrigger for optimized animations, and created custom Three.js scenes with efficient LOD systems. The bilingual implementation uses react-i18next with proper URL structure and hreflang tags for SEO. Performance is optimized through code splitting, image optimization, and progressive loading strategies.
technicalHighlights: Custom animation system with reduced motion support
Advanced React patterns with custom hooks
Web Vitals optimization achieving excellent scores

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about my services.

project_types.q: What project types do you build?
project_types.a: Websites, web apps, e-commerce, redesigns, and maintenance — exactly as in the contact wizard.

pricing.a: Prices are "from" amounts. A precise quote follows a short discovery based on scope, features, and deadline.

timeline.q: How long will my project take?
timeline.a: Small websites: 1–3 weeks. Web apps/e-commerce: 3–8+ weeks depending on complexity and content readiness.

features.a: Responsive design, CMS, e‑commerce, custom animations, SEO, analytics, multilingual, and API integrations.

cms.a: Yes — headless CMS or WordPress depending on needs and budget.

maintenance.a: Yes. I provide updates, fixes, performance improvements, and small feature work.

redesign.a: Absolutely. I modernize UI/UX, improve performance, and refine content structure.

animations_performance.a: I use performance-first techniques (GSAP, lazy-loading, reduced-motion support) to keep things smooth.

multilingual.q: Do you support bilingual or multilingual sites?
multilingual.a: Yes. The site already supports EN/HU with i18n and can scale to more languages.

seo_analytics.a: Yes. I set up best-practice SEO and integrate analytics on request.

communication_process.q: How will we communicate and track progress?
communication_process.a: Regular check-ins via chat/call, shared tasks, and milestone reviews.

payments.a: Typically 30–50% upfront, remainder on milestones or delivery (invoice provided).
